structure.unit: ESCAPES, FUGITIVES FROM JUSTICE, AND EXTRADITION

law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 497, sec. 30, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 1.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Interstate agreement on detainers to apply to detainers based on affidavits and warrants charging violation of probation and parole.
